body: "Shitto to Fukujuu no Foxtail" is "technically" the prequel to this, but there is no over-arching storyline, it just has the same foxgirl and Male protagonist (84399)

Given that she's using fire, I would assume that's a Fox girl by default, fire is usually associated with them. Aside from that, he did leave it off in a way that implied a sequel, but I don't see anything like that browsing an author search...hope he does make one, pretty much every translated work of his I've read now is great.
Is there any prequel that's about the cat/dog/foxgirl ?
